description: Returns a new DataFrame sorted by label when inplace=False (default).
quote: Returns a new DataFrame sorted by label if inplace argument is False
otherwise updates the original DataFrame and returns None

description: Default sort is ascending (ascending=True by default).
axis=1 (or 'columns') sorts column labels, not row labels.
na_position='last' puts NaN index values at the end of the sorted result.
quote: last puts NaNs at the end

description: na_position='first' puts NaN index values at the beginning of the sorted result.
quote: Puts NaNs at the beginning if first

description: ignore_index=True relabels the result axis as 0, 1, ..., n-1.
quote: If True, the resulting axis will be labeled 0, 1, …, n - 1.

description: key function is applied to index values before sorting.
quote: If not None, apply the key function to the index values before sorting.

description: Only mergesort and stable are stable sort algorithms.
quote: mergesort and stable are the only stable algorithms.

description: sort_remaining=True sorts remaining MultiIndex levels after sorting by specified level.
quote: If True and sorting by level and index is multilevel, sort by other levels too (in order) after sorting by specified level.

description: level parameter sorts on values in specified index level(s) for MultiIndex.
quote: If not None, sort on values in specified index level(s).
